Description: Japanese Teacher instruct student in the Japanese language, fostering cultural understanding and global communication. Responsibilities include lesson planning, grading, and promoting language proficiency and cultural literacy.1 hour / day - 3 times a week Skills
Skills: Fluency in Japanese language - the candidate must possess excellent command over the Japanese language and should be able to read, write and speak fluently.
Teaching experience - the candidate must have prior experience in teaching Japanese language to students of different age groups and proficiency levels.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills - the candidate should have strong communication skills, be patient, empathetic, and should be able to establish a rapport with the student.
Flexibility - the candidate should be flexible with their teaching approach and should be able to adapt and modify the course materials according to the learning pace and needs of the student.
